snippet: "It's easy, but not helpful or fair, to criticize CME Group's diligent and appropriate oversight based on what is now known about how MF Global violated exchange and C.F.T.C. rules," writes the executive chairman of the CME Group.
abstract: "It's easy, but not helpful or fair, to criticize CME Group's diligent and appropriate oversight based on what is now known about how MF Global violated exchange and C.F.T.C. rules," writes the executive chairman of the CME Group.
lead_paragraph: Terrence Duffy is the executive chairman of the CME Group.

headline.main: CME  Chief Speaks Out on C.F.T.C. Inquiry
